title: 03/02/21 DPS Best OF
itunes:title: 03/02/21 DPS Best OF
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses J.J. Watt's announcement to sign with the Arizona Cardinals. Sports radio columnist and host Dan Brickley joined the show to weigh in on the signing. While bringing the three time DPOY helps the defense, Bickley said that the offense was the bigger problem, not the defense. Lastly, fan-favorite Ross Tucker returned to the show to talk all things NFL, from Russell Wilson’s future, to Tucker’s own career.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
